As the originator of [[Orochimaru's Juinjutsu]] and the possessor of a [[Jūgo's Clan's Kekkei Genkai|unique clan ability]], Jūgo is able to give his flesh to those that are compatible with said cursed seals, thus healing any injuries they may have received. Because he is transferring his cells to the recipient, Jūgo's own body regresses in age, becoming younger in appearance. The effects, however, are temporary and can be reverted using the [[Cellular Regeneration Absorption|counterpart]] for this technique.

== Trivia ==
* In the [[Fourth Shinobi World War]], [[Kabuto Yakushi]] revived [[Sasuke Uchiha]] in a similar manner, by connecting his navel snake with Sasuke's torso and apparently using [[Hashirama Senju]]'s cells, along with a [[Tobirama Senju|certain someone]]'s advice.
